description: Contains information on the locked status of Home Health Outcome and Assessment Information Set (OASIS) data sets.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the OASIS data set.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OASIS_LOCK_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
OASIS data set locked status, locked or unlocked.  Links to category table ZC_OASIS_LOCK_STAT.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unlocked


Locked

columns.name: OASIS_LOCK_USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of the user who locked the OASIS data set.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: OASIS_LOCK_INSTANT
columns.description: Instant at which the OASIS data set was locked.

columns.name: OASIS_SNAPSHOT_DAT
columns.description: The contact pointer to the OASIS snapshot data.
